company_info.Company Description: VMAKE VISAS PROVIDE (ORAS) “OVERSEAS RESUME ADVERTISEMENT SERVICES” IN CANADA ,AUSTRALIA.ORAS-VMAKE VISAS PROVIDE (ORAS) “OVERSEAS RESUME ADVERTISEMENT SERVICES”MIDDAL EAST COUNTRY, CANADA, AUSTRALIA, UK, USA, NEW ZEALAND, NORWAY,DENMARK AND REST OF THE WORLD.ANDFOR AUSTRALIA PERMANENT RESIDENCY-HOT OCCUPATIONS WIDE OPEN IN AUSTRALIA FOR IMMIGRATION FOR SKILLED PROFESSIONALS.ANDFOR CANADA PERMANENT RESIDENCY-CANADA FEDERAL SKILLED MIGRATION.ANDVISA IMMIGRATION CONSULTANCY SERVICES -BUSINESS VISA, INVESTMENT VISA , WORK & WORK PERMIT VISA, VISIT & VISITORS VISA, DEPENDENT VISA, TOURIST VISA, SPOUSE VISA, STUDY VISA.(PERMANENT RESIDENCY), CANADA, AUSTRALIA, UK, USA, NEW ZEALAND, NORWAY DENMARK AND SINGAPORE,ANDSTUDY ABROAD-STUDY ABROAD CONSULTANTS,STUDY ABROAD COUNSELORS.CANADA, AUSTRALIA, UK, USA, NEW ZEALAND, NORWAY,  DENMARK & SINGAPORE.VMAKE VISAS(Immigrant Immigrates with Vmake Visas )VMAKE VISAS PVT. LTD.

api_data.job_title: Walk in for Visa documentation (Females only)

jd_information.description: As a Documentation Executive you have to ensure completion of all relevant visa and immigration documents are received within the time frame. As a Documentation Executive you have to ensure that all of the information provided by the client is accurate and correct As a Documentation Executive you have to ensure there are no communication gaps between the company and the client As a Documentation Executive you have to ensure you provide good customer service to the client. Interview all clients; deal with all their questions and queries Calling prospective clients and making follow ups on daily basis. When required To talk to the client through calls, emails and face to face
